reviews.review_msg: Becky was funny, but it seemed like she could not communicate to us, the students, or even the TA's, what was going on in the course. I felt the course was very independent. Every lab required extensive research and I had questions that were essential to complete the report, that no one seemed capable of answering. Would not recommend.

Awesome prof but hard class.  Hopefully they will make CHEM 260 a pre-req instead of a co-req soon or else expect to have to self teach much of quantum chemistry during every lab report.  Dr. Leach was always super helpful if you went to see him though
